    • Method Detail

      • getMetadataJSON

        static java.lang.String getMetadataJSON(Code.Metadata metadata)
        Provides the JSON string representation of the provided Code.Metadata instance. It has the following general structure, 
         {
    "headers": [
       "header-1",
       "header-2"
    ],
    "documentation": "documentation",
    "crucialMetadata": {
       "description": "brief-description-of-code",
       "location": "/path/to/code",
       "title": "title-of-code"
    }
 }
        Parameters:
        metadata - instance whose JSOn representation is required
        Returns:
        A JSON string created from the Cde.Metadata instance.

      • getIndexJSON

        static java.lang.String getIndexJSON(java.lang.String IndexJSON,
                                     Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata crucialMetadata)
        Provides the JSON string representation of the JSON created by appending the JSON representation of the provided Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata to the provided indexJSON. The created new JSON representation serves as the new index structure which has the following general structure, 
         {
     "location-1": {
        "title": "title-1",
        "description": "description-1",
     },
     "location-2": {
        "title": "title-2",
        "description": "description-2",
     },
     ...
 }
        Parameters:
        IndexJSON - JSON string representation of the index to which the JSON representation on crucialMetadata is to be appended. When null, a new JSON string is formed from the crucilaMetadata.
        crucialMetadata - The Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata instance which is appended to the provided index JSON (or) used to create the new index JSON
        Returns:
        JSON String representation of the index

      • getIndexJSON

        static java.lang.String getIndexJSON(Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata crucialMetadata)
        Provides the JSON string representation of the JSON created from the instance of Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata. The created new JSON representation serves as the new index structure.
        Parameters:
        crucialMetadata - The Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata instance which is used to create the new index JSON
        Returns:
        JSON String representation of the newly created index

      • getCrucialMetadata

        static Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata getCrucialMetadata(java.lang.String crucialMetadataJSON)
        Provides a Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata instance constructed from the JSON string that was previously formed from it.
        Parameters:
        crucialMetadataJSON - The JSON string used to create the Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata instance.
        Returns:
        Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata instance created from the JSON string

      • getMetadata

        static Code.Metadata getMetadata(java.lang.String metadataJSON)
        Provides the Code.Metadata representation of the given JSON string
        Parameters:
        metadataJSON - String representation of the JSON that is used to create a Code.Metdata instance
        Returns:
        Code.Metadata instance representation of the given JSON string

      • getIndex

        static java.util.Collection<Code.Metadata.CrucialMetadata> getIndex(java.lang.String indexJSON)
        Provides a list of Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata instances formed from the provided JSON string, which was previously generated to store the index.
        Parameters:
        indexJSON - String representation of the JSON that is used create the list of Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata instances
        Returns:
        List of Code.Metadata.CrucialMetdata generated from the provided index JSON string
